headline: A look at Hewlett Packard Enterprise's valuation as networking growth, AI deals and 2026 guidance reinforce its outlook
summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) just backed up its AI and networking story with numbers, reaffirming its 2026 guidance after reporting strong networking growth, launching new products, and securing a $931 million government cloud contract. See our latest analysis for Hewlett Packard Enterprise. Against that backdrop of raised guidance, networking momentum, and new AI infrastructure launches, Hewlett Packard Enterprise’s 1 month share price return of 5.34% and 5 year total shareholder return...
